Need assistance? Try one of the below!

It could be a memory issue. Double click the home button to see a dock of all apps that are running in the background. If there are a lot running, you may want to close some apps completely (click and hold the icon in the dock till the red minus sign appears, tap to close it) since some programs drain phone memory. Then restart the Hungama App. If you are still facing issues, do report the problem and we\'ll help you out.
Hungama.com App is the one-stop destination to stream & download all Music & Music Videos!
A WOW experience with the largest collection of Indian music albums, videos, live curated radio & more…
